info.description: The Platform REST API lets you integrate with Rose Rocket applications using simple HTTP methods, in JSON formats, making this an ideal API for developing mobile applications or external clients.
info.title: Rose Rocket Platform REST API

parameters.name: created_start_at
parameters.description: Date range (start)

parameters.name: created_end_at
parameters.description: Date range (end)

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Search term

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: External ID to filter by

parameters.name: in_external_ids
parameters.description: External ID's to filter by

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Pagination limit

post.summary: Create new customer's order

parameters.name: customerID
parameters.description: ID of the customer that creates the order. It could also be the external ID of the customer, but in order to use external ID it has to follow this format: __ext:{externalID}__ or __external_id:{externalID}__. So for example if the customer's external ID is __test123__ then the value of customerID should be __ext:test1234__ or __external_id:test1234__.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Order object

post.summary: Bulk create orders for a given customer.

parameters.name: customerID
parameters.description: ID of the customer that creates the order. It could also be the external ID of the customer, but in order to use external ID it has to follow this format: __ext:{externalID}__ or __external_id:{externalID}__. So for example if the customer's external ID is __test123__ then the value of customerID should be __ext:test1234__ or __external_id:test1234__.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Bulk create request object

post.summary: Bulk create orders for several customers.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Bulk create request object

put.summary: Add a file/document to a specified leg

parameters.name: legID

It could also be the external ID of the leg, but in order to use external ID it has to follow this format: __ext:{externalID}__ or __external_id:{externalID}__. put.summary: Upsert payment items to a manifest payment. To update a payment, specify a valid id for the payment. Payments without ids will be created.

parameters.name: manifestID
parameters.description: ID of the manifest for which to upsert a set of payments. It could also be the external ID of the manifest, but in order to use external ID it has to follow this format: __ext:{externalID}__ or __external_id:{externalID}__. So for example if the manifest's external ID is __test123__ then the value of manifestID should be __ext:test1234__ or __external_id:test1234__.

sequence_id.description: Auto generated sequence ID per customer

notes.description: Notes that will appear on BOL

po_num.description: Purchase order numbers (if multiple use comma separated values)

pickup_appt_start_at.description: Pickup appointment time range (start). This field value can be _null_

pickup_appt_end_at.description: Pickup appointment time range (end). This field value can be _null_

delivery_start_at.description: Expected delivery time range (start). This field value can be _null_

delivery_end_at.description: Expected delivery time range (end). This field value can be _null_

delivery_appt_end_at.description: Delivery appointment time range (end). This field value can be _null_

address_book_id.description: Auto generated address book id. This field value can be _null_. Leave this field as null if you want to manually specify the address. If you want to populate the address using address_book_id, you must leave address_book_external_id empty.

address_book_external_id.description: Address book external id. This field value can be _null_. Leave this field as null if you want to manually specify the address. If you want to populate the address using address_book_external_id, you must leave address_book_id empty.

latitude.description: Coordinate (latitude). This field value can be _null_

longitude.description: Coordinate (longitude). This field value can be _null_

bus_hours_start_at.description: Business hours range (start). This field value can be _null_

bus_hours_end_at.description: Business hours range (end). This field value can be _null_

external_id.description: Customer external id. This field value can be _null_

commodity_type_other.description: If commodity type is set to _other_, then this field must have value

feet.description: Total feet in length of the truck the commodity is occupying. This field must have value if order's dimension type is set to _ftl_

volume.description: Total volume of the commodity item. This field must have value if order's dimension type is set to _volume_

is_stackable.description: Is this commodity can be stacked?

pieces.description: Total number of pieces. This field value can be _null_

sequence_id.description: Auto generated sequence ID per customer

external_id.description: External ID for mapping the leg to an external system. This field value can be _null_

manifest_id.description: Related manifest ID (assigned). This field value can be _null_

destination_stop_id.description: Stop ID of the destination (only if this leg has been assigned to a manifest). This field value can be _null_

latitude.description: Coordinate (latitude). This field value can be _null_

longitude.description: Coordinate (longitude). This field value can be _null_
